attributes.additional_details: Increasingly Hong Konger's are beginning to resent the Peoples Republic of China (PRC) and there failure to bestow democracy on Hong Kong. Many also would like to see a British Democratic rule restored in the region. Britain can help by entering discussions for the PRC to either ceed back the territory to Britain where we can establish a devolved government or for it to become independent all together. We owe this to our loyal Hong Konger's
